title: Life cycle and economic assessment of tidal energy farms in early design phases: Application to a second-generation tidal device
content:
Publication date: 30 June 2024

Source: Heliyon, Volume 10, Issue 12

Author(s): M. Bianchi, A.J. Arnal, M. Astorkiza-Andres, J. Clavell-Diaz, A. Marques, M. Isasa-Sarralde
